titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify and make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify and make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses; (2) increase the maximum amount of such deduction to $5,000 and repeal provisions requiring a phaseout of the deduction based on adjusted gross income; and (3) allow grandparents to claim a deduction for the tuition and related expenses of their grandchildren.
